Classes in com.snap2d.gl used by com.snap2d.gl
Display.Type
           
GammaTable
          Pre-calculates an internal table of gamma corrected RGB values and provides look-up functionality to apply the gamma to integer pixels.
GLConfig
          Object that represents configuration data for Java2D rendering.
GLConfig.Property
          Properties used by Java2D (configurable at start or by System.setProperty).
Renderable
          Defines a standard for objects that are rendered on screen and called on each tick of the game loop.
RenderControl
          Acts as a rendering handle to a Display.
